message: Starting migration of phases.py from JSON to SQLite state_db
Analyzed phases.py structure - found 2 endpoints needing migration at lines 48 and 64
Analyzed state_db interface - found load_task_snapshot and get_phase_agent_counts functions
Migrated first endpoint - get_phases() now uses state_db with JSON fallback
Verifying migration completeness and testing file syntax
Successfully migrated phases.py to SQLite state_db. Both endpoints now use state_db.load_task_snapshot and state_db.get_phase_agent_counts with JSON fallback. File syntax validated.
